content: sts from the waste yarn onto 3 dpn s attach new yarn pick up and knit 3 sts in the space between the thumb and palm knit the 13 sts just placed on the dpn s that completes one round o work 6 rounds of k2 p2 rib o cast off loosely in the rib pattern weave in all ends left mitt cast on 44 stitches in the following manner 12 sts on needle 1 18 sts on needle 2 14 sts on needle 3 join in the round being careful not to twist your work work 12 rounds of p2 k2 rib begin hand of mitt… round 1 k12 p1 row 1 pattern p1 k14 round 2 k12 p1 row 2 pattern p1 k14 round 3 k12 p1 row 3 pattern p1 k14 round 4 k12 p1 row 4 pattern p1 k14 round 5 k12 p1 row 5 pattern p1 k14 round 6 k8 pm m1 k1 m1 pm k3 p1 row 6 pattern p1 k14 round 7 k14 p1 row 1 pattern p1 k14 round 8 k14 p1 row 2 pattern p1 k14 round 9 k8 pm m1 k3 m1 pm k3 p1 row 3 pattern p1 k14 round 10 k16 p1 row 4 pattern p1 k14 round 11 k16 p1 row 5 pattern p1 k14 round 12 k8 pm m1 k5 m1 pm k3 p1 row 6 pattern p1 k14 continue in this manner until there are 13 sts between the markers increasing 2 sts every 3 rounds through round 21 round 22 k8 place next 13 sts on waste yarn cast-on 1 st using the backward loop cast-on k3 p1 row 4 pattern p1 k14 round 23 k12 p1 row 5 pattern p1 k14 round 24 k12 p1 row 6 pattern p1 k14 continue in this manner until there are 5 repeats of the cable pattern then work in this manner until row 1-4 of the pattern are completed one more time work 6 rounds of p2 k2 rib cast off loosely in the rib pattern thumb o put the 13 sts from the waste yarn onto 3 dpn s attach new yarn pick up and knit 3 sts in the space between the thumb and palm knit the 13 sts just placed on the dpn s that completes one round o work 6 rounds of k2 p2 rib o cast off loosely in the rib pattern weave in all ends ©copyright held by tera johnson for personal use only not to be posted to any other website without the designer s permission
